channel.title: Some Updates on An internet page
channel.description: Recent content in Some Updates on An internet page

item.title: Paper accepted to KDD 2021
item.description: Yay! Our paper on crop row detection using clustering based online domain adaptation was accepted to KDD 2021 😎 ✌🏼

item.title: Started "investing" in some dogecoin
item.description: 2020 took a bigger toll on my mental health than I anticipated 🙄

item.title: Joined the Control Lab at Indiana University
item.description: First day as a graduate research assistant. Projects look promising! 🤞

item.title: First day at Samsung Research
item.description: First job as a full-time software engineer. The AC is a bit too ❄️ and no one knows where the controls are but all in all it seems like a fun place with like minded people.

item.title: Graduated in Mechanical Engineering 👨🏼‍🎓
item.description: Did my best to increase the Universe’s entropy for the last four years 🤷‍♂️
